Name: MeiQi 2019
About the game: MeiQi Series Introduction MeiQi Suspense is a mystery game set in 1990s China, where the player takes on the role of a police detective, 'Liu Youth', as the core force of justice, solving cases and defeating various evil organizations. The chapters of the game are composed of many independent cases, which are continuous and independent, and together weave a very rich plot story. As of late summer 2022, there have been nine consecutive seasons, each consisting of six independently playable games (DLC). Each DLC has an approximate play time of 1-2 hours. MeiQi 2019 This collection is the opening game of Maggie Sun's Suspicions, the entrance to Maggie Sun's mini-universe. This collection will be redeveloped based on the original using the Unreal5 engine. You will get better visual enjoyment as well as control experience on PC platform. This collection includes. Season 1 S01E01:SunMeiqi S01E02:FangTingting S01E03:WangSifeng S01E04:WangAiguo S01E05:DuCuilan S01E06:Moli Game Features Rich scenery and 1990s local nostalgia Each individual case takes place in a unique location, with carefully designed scenes and objects. 90's China is familiar and unfamiliar, and you'll feel especially close to it. As the cases continue, you will be treated to a complete look at China in the 80's and 90's. They will include: homes and lodges, temples and ancient buildings, public spaces, transportation, and any location you have ever thought of. Separate but continuous episodes and continuous updates Each case is a stand-alone game that can be played in any order, and you can enter the Sunmatch universe from any case (DLC), and the exciting plot will be continuously updated, and you can get the latest information (trailers and new clues) through Steam or other media! The core gameplay of scene exploration, puzzle solving, and deduction correlation Carefully designed scenes with a series of objects furnished, organs, puzzles, you can search for evidence in the process to understand the plot, deduction and connection is the core gameplay of the Sun Miki case, as a detective, you must master the skills of deduction!
